tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stem_cells (
 sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 sample_type TEXT,
 donor_id INT,
 collection_date DATE,
 usage_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE stem_cell_samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    collection_date DATE,
    storage_location VARCHAR(50),
    is_healthy BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE sample_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    quantity_used INT,
    purpose TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES inventory(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE stem_cell_samples (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_type VARCHAR(255),
  storage_location VARCHAR(100),
  quantity INT,
  expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_tracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  date_time TIMESTAMP,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  user_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE usage_records (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    stem_cell_id INT,
    used_date DATE,
    user_id INT,
    purpose VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    stem_cell_id INT,
    action_type VARCHAR(255),
    action_description TEXT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP
);
